Sentencas: The cost-effectiveness of Solid Oxide Cells production can be improved by introducing multilayer-tape-casting (MTC: sequential casting of the layers) and co-sintering of the half-cells.
Titulo: Residual stresses and strength of multilayer tape cast solid oxide fuel and electrolysis half-cells

Sentencas: MTC additionally results in more homogeneous layers with strong interfaces.
Titulo: Residual stresses and strength of multilayer tape cast solid oxide fuel and electrolysis half-cells

Sentencas: However, the thermal expansion coefficient (TEC) mismatch between the layers, cumulated from high temperature, induces significant residual stresses in the half-cells.
Titulo: Residual stresses and strength of multilayer tape cast solid oxide fuel and electrolysis half-cells

Sentencas: Furthermore, it has been observed that MTC half-cells with 4 layers (MTC4: support, fuel electrode, electrolyte and barrier layer) are sometimes more fragile to handle than those with 3 layers (MTC3: without barrier layer).
Titulo: Residual stresses and strength of multilayer tape cast solid oxide fuel and electrolysis half-cells

Sentencas: The bending strength of MTC3 and MTC4 under various loading orientations (electrolyte on the tensile or compressive side of the loading) is compared.
Titulo: Residual stresses and strength of multilayer tape cast solid oxide fuel and electrolysis half-cells

Sentencas: The analysis, by taking residual stresses into account, shows that the strength of the half-cells with the electrolyte on the compressive side corresponds to the strength of the support.
Titulo: Residual stresses and strength of multilayer tape cast solid oxide fuel and electrolysis half-cells

Sentencas: With the loading in the other direction (electrolyte on the tensile side), the origin of the failure is in a different layer for MTC3 (fuel electrode) and for MTC4 (barrier layer).
Titulo: Residual stresses and strength of multilayer tape cast solid oxide fuel and electrolysis half-cells

Sentencas: In order to decrease the tensile residual stresses, especially in the outer barrier-layer, possible changes to the layer properties are discussed and some optimization guidelines proposed.
Titulo: Residual stresses and strength of multilayer tape cast solid oxide fuel and electrolysis half-cells
